channel.title: How do I Create a Custom Shop?
channel.description:
I know how to create a shop, but the problem is, I don't know how to get an empty shop so I can add items to it. Can anyone give me a tutorial on how to ?
I want to make the Seller be; Tradeable or Talkable & I want the shop to be empty.
If anyone can help me out, I'd really appreciate it!

item.title: How do I Create a Custom Shop?
item.dc:creator: @devils_revenge devils revenge
item.description:
@devils_revenge wrote:

urban i have a good shop make itsd literally called ShopMaker v1.0 by Jaywalker i dnow iof that helps but the download link i have is now broken so :S

item.title: How do I Create a Custom Shop?
item.dc:creator: @rawrcrystal rawrcrystal
item.description:
@rawrcrystal wrote:

Ok i will attempt to help you.
First find the Npc id you wish to sell the items.
We will do lowe for an example.
Go to autospawn.cfg(do not delete anything in there)
Go to bottom of the autospawn.cfg and put:
spawn = 550 (xcoord) (ycoord) 0 0 0 0 0 1

Then to add items, go in shops.cfg…You will figure out rest, i’m done I would help but that would be spoon feeding you.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I Create a Custom Shop?

demonnd:

well now try the beginer tuts and shit if you want to get pissy with me i wont mind ill be the adult and just leave the help section plus the link i gave you had a tut on it that shows how to make a shop so no your wrong.

Acutally, there wasn’t.
There was not a single tutorial on how to make a custom shop.
I’m pissed off at the fact that people have to act so childish and try to explain things using “Let me google that for you”
